description: General configuration settings for the card tree.

schemaVersion.description: Version of the schema used by this project

cardKeyPrefix.description: The prefix or the fist component of the card key. For example, ABC

hubs.description: List of hubs from where to fetch module information

modules.description: List of modules that have been included in the project

name.description: Module name (project prefix). Must be unique.

location.description: Git remote URL, or relative file reference.

branch.description: If using git remote URL in 'location' defines git branch. If empty, uses repository default branch'.

private.description: If true, the module is private and requires credentials (CYBERISMO_GIT_USER / CYBERISMO_GIT_TOKEN) or SSH. Does not apply for local file modules.

title: CardsConfig
